events.message: I received my order last week but the product does not match the description and I would like to request a refund for the item.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer's mention of returning the product and wanting money back.
Support agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request and communicate next steps with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product to help us verify the issue and process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the product differs from the description on your website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and send you instructions on how to return the product at no cost to you.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful instructions. I appreciate the straightforward refund process.
The refund has been processed and you should see the credit reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
We just wanted to check in and ensure that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you!
